content:
I just announced this on the official FHIR-I mailing list, but repeating here for visibiltiy:

## Comment Submitters

  • Bas van den Heuvel
  • Danny Wise
  • Isaac Vetter
  • Justin Stauffer
  • Kensaku Kawamoto
  • Luke Matthews
  • Marc Hadley
  • Mitra Rocca
  • Sean McIlvenna
  • Sunanda McGarvey
  • Yunwei Wang

## Line Items

  • GF#21914 So an empty result is allowed if none of the resources are allowed - BULKDATA #100 (Bas van den Heuvel) Considered - Question Answered
  • GF#21195 "2 Referenced Specifications" section references R3 (Danny Wise)
  • GF#21654 Incorrect header number from HL7 tooling - BULKDATA #1 (Yunwei Wang)
  • GF#21655 Incorrect header number from HL7 tooling - BULKDATA #2 (Yunwei Wang)
  • GF#21657 Request for common system data set like terminology data in addition to common clinical data set - BULKDATA #3 (Yunwei Wang)
  • GF#21664 Rreturn status codes for incomplete successful exports - BULKDATA #6 (Yunwei Wang)
  • GF#21673 Merge the three Operations into one with different urls - BULKDATA #9 (Yunwei Wang)
  • GF#21676 In the "Backend Service authroziation" diagram the "App" should be "Client" . - BULKDATA #10 (Yunwei Wang)
  • GF#21682 Public health surveillance studies that do not require real-time exchange of data. We suggest supporting public health surveillance as a use case. - BULKDATA #12 (Sunanda McGarvey)
  • GF#21706 Format mime types consistently - BULKDATA #20 (Isaac Vetter)
  • GF#21709 Super-nitpicky: Content-Location is a URL and not just a URI right? - BULKDATA #21 (Isaac Vetter)
  • GF#21715 Missing example access_token. - BULKDATA #23 (Isaac Vetter)
  • GF#21721 Should there be a description of the all patients endpoint - BULKDATA #25 (Justin Stauffer)
  • GF#21742 Sentence's meaning is unclear - BULKDATA #32 (Luke Matthews)
  • GF#21748 Signature verification is part of the processing requirements not in addition to. - BULKDATA #34 (Luke Matthews)
  • GF#21780 Based on FHIR R4 title should be consistent with FHIR Release 3 - BULKDATA #44 (Mitra Rocca)
  • GF#21786 Section number should be revised%2Fremoved in Use this profile - BULKDATA #46 (Mitra Rocca)
  • GF#21792 Section number should be revised%2Fremoved in Protocol details - BULKDATA #48 (Mitra Rocca)
  • GF#21804 Thanks for security risk assessment - BULKDATA #52 (Kensaku Kawamoto)
  • GF#21836 Add an example of the OperationOutcome response - BULKDATA #62 (Marc Hadley)
  • GF#21847 Additional guidance on "Prefer" header. - BULKDATA #72 (Sean McIlvenna)
  • GF#21850 Rename "_since" parameter to "_from". - BULKDATA #73 (Sean McIlvenna)
  • GF#21865 Change the required response/file/download format - BULKDATA #78 (Sean McIlvenna)
  • GF#21881 Provide a PDF export of the IG for the next ballot - BULKDATA #89 (Bas van den Heuvel)
  • GF#21890 The security document is more than a year old. Is it still valid%3F - BULKDATA #92 (Bas van den Heuvel)
  • GF#21724 Don%27t give history of _since naming. - BULKDATA #26 (Justin Stauffer) Persuasive
  • GF#21774 Section number should be revised/removed. - BULKDATA #42 (Mitra Rocca) Persuasive
  • GF#21777 Section number should be revised/removed. - BULKDATA #43 (Mitra Rocca) Persuasive
As always, let us know if you want to remove any issues from the block.
